posts.message: when it comes to have encoding errors with Arabic language in IE 10 within Windows 8, while opening a SharePoint 2007 site you say: Microsoft Microsoft Microsoft :@ :@ :@

OMS: Urgently needed

1 Senior Graphics Designer
2 Software Developer
3 QA Engineer
4 Senior BI Developer
5 QC Engineer
6 Tech Lead (.Net and BizTalk is a must)
7 Senior Software Developer
8 Software Developer (1-2 years’ experience. BizTalk is a plus)

Interested applicants are kindly requested to send their CVs to:
ranashedid@hotmail.com 

Please mention the job title in subject field.
